程序包 org.apache.hadoop.io.compress
的使用

  • 使用org.apache.hadoop.io.compress的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.io
    Generic i/o code for use when reading and writing data to the network, to databases, and to files.
    org.apache.hadoop.io.compress  
    org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.bzip2  
    org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.lz4  
    org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.snappy  
    org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.zlib  
  • org.apache.hadoop.io使用的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的类 
    类和说明
    CompressionCodec
    This class encapsulates a streaming compression/decompression pair.
  • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress使用的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的类 
    类和说明
    CompressionCodec
    This class encapsulates a streaming compression/decompression pair.
    CompressionInputStream
    A compression input stream.
    CompressionOutputStream
    A compression output stream.
    Compressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionOutputStream to compress data.
    CompressorStream 
    Decompressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'de-compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionInputStream to compress data.
    DecompressorStream 
    DefaultCodec 
    DirectDecompressionCodec
    This class encapsulates a codec which can decompress direct bytebuffers.
    DirectDecompressor
    Specification of a direct ByteBuffer 'de-compressor'.
    SplitCompressionInputStream
    An InputStream covering a range of compressed data.
    SplittableCompressionCodec
    This interface is meant to be implemented by those compression codecs which are capable to compress / de-compress a stream starting at any arbitrary position.
    SplittableCompressionCodec.READ_MODE
    During decompression, data can be read off from the decompressor in two modes, namely continuous and blocked.
  • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.bzip2使用的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的类 
    类和说明
    Compressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionOutputStream to compress data.
    Decompressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'de-compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionInputStream to compress data.
    SplittableCompressionCodec.READ_MODE
    During decompression, data can be read off from the decompressor in two modes, namely continuous and blocked.
  • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.lz4使用的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的类 
    类和说明
    Compressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionOutputStream to compress data.
    Decompressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'de-compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionInputStream to compress data.
  • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.snappy使用的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的类 
    类和说明
    Compressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionOutputStream to compress data.
    Decompressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'de-compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionInputStream to compress data.
    DirectDecompressor
    Specification of a direct ByteBuffer 'de-compressor'.
  • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.zlib使用的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的类 
    类和说明
    Compressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionOutputStream to compress data.
    Decompressor
    Specification of a stream-based 'de-compressor' which can be plugged into a CompressionInputStream to compress data.
    DirectDecompressor
    Specification of a direct ByteBuffer 'de-compressor'.
    DoNotPool
    This is a marker annotation that marks a compressor or decompressor type as not to be pooled.
